verses.verse: שִׁ֥יר <WH7892> A Song הַֽמַּעֲל֗וֹת <WH4609> of degrees לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> of David שָׂ֭מַחְתִּי <WH8055> I was glad בְּאֹמְרִ֣ים <WH559> when they said לִ֑י בֵּ֖ית <WH1004> into the house יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD נֵלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> go
עֹ֭מְדוֹת <WH5975> shall stand הָי֣וּ <WH1961> become רַגְלֵ֑ינוּ <WH7272> Our feet בִּ֝שְׁעָרַ֗יִךְ <WH8179> within thy gates יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> O Jerusalem
יְרוּשָׁלִַ֥ם <WH3389> Jerusalem הַבְּנוּיָ֑ה <WH1129> is builded כְּ֝עִ֗יר <WH5892> as a city שֶׁחֻבְּרָה־ <WH2266> that is compact לָּ֥הּ יַחְדָּֽו׃ <WH3162> together

שֶׁשָּׁ֨ם <WH8033> Whither עָל֪וּ <WH5927> go up שְׁבָטִ֡ים <WH7626> the tribes שִׁבְטֵי־ <WH7626> the tribes יָ֭הּ <WH3050> of the LORD עֵד֣וּת <WH5715> unto the testimony לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel לְ֝הֹד֗וֹת <WH3034> to give thanks לְשֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> unto the name יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

כִּ֤י <WH3588> For שָׁ֨מָּה ׀ <WH8033> there יָשְׁב֣וּ <WH3427> For there are set כִסְא֣וֹת <WH3678> thrones לְמִשְׁפָּ֑ט <WH4941> of judgment כִּ֝סְא֗וֹת <WH3678> the thrones לְבֵ֣ית <WH1004> of the house דָּוִֽיד׃ <WH1732> of David
שַׁ֭אֲלוּ <WH7592> Pray שְׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> for the peace יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <WH3389> of Jerusalem יִ֝שְׁלָ֗יוּ <WH7951> they shall prosper אֹהֲבָֽיִךְ׃ <WH157> that love
יְהִֽי־ <WH1961> become שָׁל֥וֹם <WH7965> Peace בְּחֵילֵ֑ךְ <WH2426> be within thy walls שַׁ֝לְוָ֗ה <WH7962> [and] prosperity בְּאַרְמְנוֹתָֽיִךְ׃ <WH759> within thy palaces
לְ֭מַעַן <WH4616> the sake אַחַ֣י <WH251> For my brethren וְרֵעָ֑י <WH7453> and companions' אֲדַבְּרָה־ <WH1696> sakes I will now say נָּ֖א <WH4994> will now שָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> Peace בָּֽךְ׃
לְ֭מַעַן <WH4616> the sake בֵּית־ <WH1004> Because of the house יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <WH430> our God אֲבַקְשָׁ֖ה <WH1245> I will seek ט֣וֹב <WH2896> thy good לָֽךְ׃
